issue.message: Method `onGetLegacyFallbackDisabledRoles()` is a flagged API and should be inside an `if (Flags.systemServerRoleControllerEnabled())` check (or annotate the surrounding method `getLegacyFallbackDisabledRoles` with `@FlaggedApi(Flags.FLAG_SYSTEM_SERVER_ROLE_CONTROLLER_ENABLED) to transfer requirement to caller`)
